selected_quotes: New article 'Why does smart devolution matter?' #RightToDecide as new 2.0 #RightToTheCity version #1oct #Catalonia
What's the metropolitanisation effect” what does this mean in terms of #devolution?
How smart devolution can promote more imaginative approaches to metropolitan city-regional politics,
Interesting take on the effects of #metropolitanisation and why #devolution matters
Why we need smart #devolution in #metropolitan political responses 2 changing nation states

citation.title: Metropolitan and city-regional politics in the urban age: why does “(smart) devolution” matter?
